name: DiplomkaGame
description:
My first alpha version of game.

I plan to release updates regularly as my old laptop will allow. I already have an idea for a game almost ready, and I dream of releasing my game, at least in the next few years. I'm waiting for your ideas for the game, maybe you'll come up with something)

And, if it's not difficult for you, please support my project, write about the bugs you find, I will try to fix them as soon as possible.

P.s. support me by sending a donation, so I will understand if I need to continue to create this game. Thanks for your attention, I really appreciate it.
